---
name: User story
about: Smallest incremental feature that delivers user value.
title: "[STORY]"
labels: user-story
assignees: ''

---

**Description**
Business/User Value: As [persona] | want to [action by user] so that [value or need met]

**Acceptance Criteria:**
GIVEN [necessary context and preconditions for story]
WHEN [action]
THEN [reaction]
